synopsis.text: James Bond-esque characters, traditional detectives, and even computer scientists converge in this captivating animated short film by the renowned WADA Makoto. The year is 1964, and a man's life has been brutally taken. With a diverse team of investigators on the case, the murderer will be unmasked by any means necessary. This thrilling anime won the prestigious Oofuji Noburou Award at the Mainichi Film Awards, proving that it's not just a mystery, but a cinematic masterpiece. Prepare to be on the edge of your seat as each detective brings their unique skills to the table to solve this enthralling case.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
